messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: RE : Disney Toon Town online game?
messages.msgSnippet: That would be awesome! My ds would love that. He loves to have chat friends on Toon Town even thou he can t read yet. PW that are numbers work great. Another
messages.messageBody:
That would be awesome! My ds would love that. He loves to have chat friends on Toon Town even thou he can't read yet.
PW that are numbers work great. Another one that my son can write is MARIO.
Let us know!
Alex

Mary McCune <mary.mccune@...> wrote:
My daughter plays on Disney and i think it would be great to get the kids
involved with this so they can learn how to chat online through a SECURE
site with parent involvement. Lets get together to think of a PW that would
easy for the kids to remember as well as the parents.

--
Mary Champion-McCune

messages.msgSnippet: My 3 sons and I play Toontown and would love to have a true friend. particularly my DS age 6. My husband just upgraded our firewall and I can t get on at the
messages.messageBody:
My 3 sons and I play Toontown and would love to have a true friend.
particularly my DS age 6. My husband just upgraded our firewall and I
can't get on at the moment but will glady email you with the code when
we are ready.

Anne Marie
Mom to Jake 9, Ian 6 and Shaun 3

My kids are both on that. Although we haven't been playing it much lately.

We've never used the True Friend feature, but we'd love to try.

heather
Sierra, 9
Quentin, 11

messages.subject: RE : Disney Toon Town online game?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi there, My 7 yr old is subscribe to the Disney Toon Town game. We re just wondering if anyone s kid is also part of this community, as my son is desperate
messages.messageBody:
Hi there,

My 7 yr old is subscribe to the Disney Toon Town game. We're just
wondering if anyone's kid is also part of this community, as my son
is "desperate" to test out the "True Friend" function. A True Friend is
where you give each other this secret code, that allows you to chat
with each other in secret language, within the Disney Toon Town
community that only you and your this True friend understand.

I'm posting the link here, just incase anyone's interested, as you can
try it for free.

http://www.disney.co.uk/toontown/main.html

SharonC
